documentation.title: Line Length

property.name: lineLimit
property.description: The limit that the length of a line should not exceed.

property.name: absoluteLineLimit
property.description:
The limit that the length of a line must not exceed.
Set to zero (0) to disable.

documentation.standard: Checks all lines in the file, and throws warnings if they are over 80 characters in length and errors if they are over 100. Both these figures can be changed by extending this sniff in your own standard.
